meanings.definition: To perceive or distinguish the flavor of something by taking it into the mouth and swallowing it.
meanings.sent1: She tasted the soup to see if it was salty.
meanings.sent2: I tasted the cake to check if it was sweet.
meanings.sent3: The detective tasted the mysterious liquid to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: His success tasted as sweet as the victory cake.
meanings.sent5: The fresh strawberries tasted like summer in every bite.

meanings.definition: To have a particular flavor or quality when perceived by the sense of taste.
meanings.sent1: The apple tasted sour and juicy.
meanings.sent2: The coffee tasted bitter but energizing.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream tasted like a frozen rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her words tasted like honey, soothing his worries.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate cake tasted like a slice of happiness.
